document_data.caption: A map of Tu Pe showing the location of the Renuki Do Jang.
document_data.name: Renuki Do Jang
document_data.aliases: Menuki Do Jang<ref group="note">While the text of ''[[Kara-Tur: The Eastern Realms]]'', page 118, refers to "Renuki's school", the accompanying map lists "Menuki Do Jang". These are assumed to be the same place, and the spelling in the text is assumed to be the correct one.
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Renuki Do Jang''', or simply '''Renuki's school''', was a military academy and ''[[Wikipedia:dojang|do jang]]'' in the city of [[Tu Pe]] in [[Koryo]]. It was founded by [[Renuki]] and was one of ten respected schools in the land for the teaching of martial arts and the techniques of honorable behavior and warfare.

In the midâ€“14th century [[DR]], Renuki's school was the among the most famous do jangs in Koryo. Many boys were sent to the school to be tested for admission.

It stood in a large walled compound in the north of the city.
